Can I have decent #SEO results with #microfrontends?
You can use compose your MFEs on the server-side or even using dynamic rendering technique (https://t.co/xcSts6QjI8)
SEO won‚Äôt suffer when you choose the right approach!

Can I share libraries across #microfrontends?
Yes but think twice before doing it because premature abstractions may do more harm than benefit and you risk to lose MFEs independence adding more communication and coordination across teams
#buildingMFE #frontend #javascript #web https://t.co/G4tqXQnjj9

Should I use #microfrontends only with #microservices?
An end to end project with micro-architectures is definitely a great choice for many reasons
But you can use them with a monolith or a modular monolith architecture as well

When a company should embrace #microfrontends?
MFEs are a possible approach for mid-sized large companies
a good rule of thumb is a company with 30-40 #devs working on the same #codebase
In small companies, a modular approach provides equal benefits üòâ
